name: Find the max depth in an array
description:
Write a method that finds the max depth in the array.

i.e.

```javascript
[] should return 1
[1] should return 1
[1, 2] should return 1
[1, [2]] should return 2
[1, [2, 2]] should return 2
[1, [2, [3]]] should return 3
[1, [2, [3, [4], 3]]] should return 4
[1, [[], [3, [], 3]]] should return 4
[1, [[], [3, [[]], 3]]] should return 5
```
